reviewText: The Ipcress File is a very good movie. It is well written,well acted and very well directed. This is one of my favorite films. However, be cautious. The DVD I purchased (which resembles the DVD pictured here) was recorded off of someone's TV set and the screen was set (possibly) to "zoom". Much of the picture frame is lost in each scene due to an overly large recorded film. There are things that will happen in a scene that you are unable to view due to the way it was recorded. My copy appears to have been a bootleg copy. Be wary. Take your time and find a quality DVD for this film.

OK--So saw the warning from another customer saying it was not a North American (Region 1) coded DVD but I looked carefully at the product information, saw no such designation so I decided to chance it.  Other customer was right.  Too bad, I saw this movie when it came out and was really looking forward to seeing it again.
Was not able to play because it was only relevant with a European type DVD player
Had to return DVD because it was an international DVD which could not be played on either of my DVD players.  Not disclosed on Amazon listing that it was an international DVD.
I received a dvd that was NOT formatted for play in the USA, am requesting a refund
love to see this old film,,
Great movie and quality. Fast ship
